title: "Advertima rings up $17.5M for computer vision-powered behavioral analytics for in-store retail"
excerpt: "Swiss computer vision startup Advertima has raised a €15 million Series A (~$17.5 million) to build out a machine learning platform for physical retail stores to ‘upgrade’ the shopping experience via real-time shopper behavior analytics."
